INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of variation of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin
Increase of the plasma concentrations of afatinib due to increase of its absorption by the ciclosporin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: It is recommended that the ciclosporin be administered as far from the afatinib as possible, preferably at an interval of 6 to 12 hours away from the administration of the dose of afatinib.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase by nearly 5 times of the plasma concentrations of aliskiren and increase of the risk of its undesirable effects.
Doubling of the concentrations of ambrisentan, with increase of the vasodilator effect (severe headaches )
Larger increase of the creatinemia than with ciclosporin alone, with increase of the nephrotoxic risk
Increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin, due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism, with risk of nephrotoxic effects
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of ciclosporin, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage of the ciclosporin during the treatment with the amiodarone

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the amphotericin B administered by IV route: greater increase of the creatinemia than with ciclosporin alone (synergy of the nephrotoxic effects of the two substances)

With the ciclosporin administered orally:
reduction of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin (decrease of its intestinal absorption).
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increase of the doses of ciclosporin according to testing of the plasma concentrations and reduction of the dosage after the treatment with the somatostatin analog is stopped

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of addition of the nephrotoxic effects, especially with older patients.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Monitor renal function at the beginning of the treatment with the NSAI.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increased risk of undesirable effects (concentration-dependant) of the rhabodmyolysis type (decrease of the intestinal absorption of the cholesterol lowering medication)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Do not exceed the dosage of 10mg/day of atorvastatin. If the therapeutic objective is not reached at that dosage, use another statin not affected by this type of interaction.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin and of the creatinemia
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the ciclosporin, testing of renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the two substances together and after the macrolide is stopped

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Large decrease of the blood concentrations of the ciclosporin and increase of the plasma concentrations of bosentan
Risk of increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin and of the creatinemia
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the ciclosporin, testing of renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the substances together and after the chloroquine is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the cimetidine used in doses greater than or equal to 800 mg/day: increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin
Decrease of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant with risk of loss of immunosuppressive activity
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Reinforce testing of the blood dosages of ciclosporin and possible increase of its dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of addition of the undesirable neuromuscular effects and increase of the toxicity of the colchicine with risk of overdose due to inhibition of its elimination by the ciclosporin, especially in cases of pre-existing renal insufficiency
Increase by more than double of the plasma concentrations of dabigatran, with increase of the risk of bleeding
Increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of ciclosporin, testing of renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the substances together and after it is stopped.

CLASS.name: POTASSIUM SPARING DIURETICS (ALONE OR IN COMBINATION)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Potentially lethal hyperkalemia, especially when there is renal insufficiency (addition of the hyperkalemia inducing effects)

Risk of increase of the creatinemia without modification of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin, even in the absence of fluid depletion. Also risk of hyperuricemia and of complications such as gout
Increase of the plasma concentrations of eribuline by the ciclosporin
Increase of the blood concentrations of the everolimus by the ciclosporin. The nephrotoxicity of the ciclosprorin is also increased when the two medications are administered together
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the everolimus, possibly adjustment of the dosage, and testing of the renal function during the administration of the two together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: For one thing, increased risk of undesirable effects (concentration-dependent) of the rhabdomyolysis type, due to increase of the concentrations of ezetimibe; for another thing, possible increase of the concentrations of ciclosporin
Risk of increase of the nephrotoxicity of the ciclosporin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical and biological monitoring of the renal function during and after the administration of the two medications together.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the fidaxomicin.
Risk of increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin and of the creatinemia
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the ciclosporin, testing of renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of these medications together and after the macrolide is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Moderate increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant and larger increase of the concentrations of the lercanidipine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Separate the administration of the two medications. Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, and adjustment if necessary of its dosage during the administration of the medications together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the toxicity of the methotrexate and of the ciclosporin with increase of the creatinemia: reciprocal decrease of the clearances of the two medications
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of ciclosporin and of methotrexate. Adjustment of the dosage if necessary during the administration of the two together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the methylprednisolone administered by IV route: possible increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin and of the creatinemia. Mecanism proposed: decrease of the hepatic elimination of the ciclosporin
Risk of increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin and of the creatinemia
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the ciclosporin, testing of renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the substances together and after the macrolide is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the blood concentrations and of the effectiveness of the immunosuppressant
Risk of addition of undesirable effects of the gum disorders type.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Use another dihydropyridine.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the nintedanib due to increase of its absorption by the ciclosporin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring during the administration of there substances together.

Reinforce testing of blood dosages of the ciclosporin, especially at the beginning of the administration of the medications together, and at the time of a possible increase in the dosage of the orlistat.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increased risk of undesirable effects (concentration-dependant) of the rhabdomyolysis type, or of nephrotoxicity, due to decrease of the metabolism of the pitavastatin
Potentially lethal hyperkalemia, especially when there is renal insufficiency (addition of the hyperkalemia inducing effects)

Increase of more than double of the concentrations of the repaglinide due to increase of its absorption
Increased risk of undesirable effects (concentration-dependant) of the rhabdomyolysis type, or of nephrotoxicity, due to decrease of the metabolism of the rosuvastatin
Risk of increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin and of the creatinemia
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the ciclosporin, testing of renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration with the macrolide and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increased risk of undesirable effects (concentration-dependant) of the rhabdomyolosis type due to decrease of the metabolism of the simvastatin
Increase of the blood concentrations of sirolimus by the ciclosporin. The nephrotoxicity of the ciclosporin is also increased when the two medications are administered together
INTERACTION.COMMENT: It is recommended that the sirolimus be administered 4 hours after the cyclosporine. Testing of the renal function, during the administration of the two medications together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin due to increase of its metabolism by the sulfinpyrazone
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Testing of blood concentrations of ciclosporin and possible adjustment of its dosage during the treatment with sulfinpyrazone and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the tenofovir alafenamide due to increase of its absorption
INTERACTION.COMMENT: In case of administration with the ciclosporin, the dose of tenofovir alafenamide must be limited to 10 mg per day.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Testing of blood concentrations of ciclosporin and possible adjustment of its dosage during the treatment with terbinafine and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increase of the dosage of the ciclosporin according to testing of the blood concentrations. Reduction of the dosage when the ticlodipine is stopped.

With the trimethoprim (alone or in combination) by IV route: the decrease of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin can be very large, with possible loss of immunosuppressant capacity
